column5: Can a person accompany a licensed angler on a fishing trip without a license if he does'nt fish, just take the odd picture.
The license is for fishing. As long as they are not fishing, they do not need one.
i would think if the person has no lisence and is not fishing, then no worrys
Thanks, tguys for the quick response. That's what I thought, but ya never know.
Just make sure he's not just "holding" the rod for you while you take a break....you just never know...LOL.
No worries there.  Friend can take the pictures, if I'm lucky. Hope I don't freeze to death. I don't think the fish will bite, because of the cold, but I just gots to try that new auger.
